name: DEATHGRIP [Alpha v0.08]
description:
DEATHGRIP is a scifi racer focused on exhilarating speeds and challenging tracks. 

The game is currently in late Alpha. There are still have a number of items on our checklist before we deem it worthy of beta. We are hoping these early builds will help steer the game in the right direction in terms of fun and difficulty. All feedback is appreciated. There is a FEEDBACK FORM you can fill out that will be very helpful for us and only takes a few minutes. We also have a DISCORD channel if you'd like to chat with us and the community. 

Current Major Features:

  • 2 racers capable of speeds up to ~1200kmh (700mph)
  • 4 original  tracks of varying difficulty in unique environments
  • Earnable Trophies and Ranks
  • Time Trial mode vs your ghost (best run)
  • An Endless Mode with some rough tiles for testing

Please keep in mind we're a small team of two, working on the game in our off-time so temper your expectations accordingly. We hope you enjoy what content there is and to hear from you soon!

Enjoy and thank you!

Reclaim Interactive
